question: Till which of the following ages the Chief Election Commissioner holds office?
option3: 62 years or completes 3 years of service, whichever is earlier
option4: 65 years of age or completes 5 years of service, whichever is earlier
explanation: The term of office of the Chief Election Commissioner and other Election Commissioners is six years from the date he/she assumes office or till the day he/she attains the age of 65 years, whichever is earlier.
